title: Good stuff available to trade for last 9 T213-2s!
author: t213

posts.post_title: Good stuff available to trade for last 9 T213-2s!
posts.post_content:
I would like to finish off my T213-2 set. I need 9 variations (see below). I have the following available to swap for them - for now these aren't for sale, just for trading for T213-2s I need:

Available:
N300 Herman Long Boston (nice image, rough corners and residue on back) SGC-A
T204 Ball Yankees SGC-40
T204 Crandall Giants SGC-20 (front is better than a 20)
T204 Konetchy Cardinals SGC-30
T204 Steinfeldt Cubs SGC-20
T213-2 Quinn Vernon PCL (one of three PCL cards in set, a difficult card) SGC-40
1923 Walter Mails Game J. Smith Cardinals SGC-88
1931 W590 Tris Speaker, Manager Newark (Very Tough variations) SGC-A for trimmed tight

My T213-2 Wantlist:
Brown (Chicago)
Demmitt (NY on shirt)
Magee (Phila caption)
McQuillan (Phila caption)
Murray (Chicago)
Reulbach (Brooklyn Fed)
Sweeney (Richmond)
Tinker (Chicago Nat, Bat on Shoulder)
Wheat (Brooklyn) [not Brooklyn Nat]

Thanks,
Andy
[url]typecard@aol.com[/url]

bump...I know these are out there. I'm also interested in buying any of these.
